welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zoeterwoude, the charming and picturesque city known for its historic windmills and scenic canals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Schiphol Airport, designed for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.
